## MessageCommandRequest class

Command request data from a message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MessageCommandRequest<InGuild extends boolean = boolean> extends CommandRequest<InGuild, MessageCommandResponse> 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `MessageCommandRequest` class.
